description.long:
Selcom Pay is the secure way to accept all mobile money payments. Get connected with millions of customers of Selcom, Airtel Money, Halotel, and TigoPesa to transact on your marketplace. 

## Apply for Selcom APIs 
[Apply and request for the API documentation »](https://www.selcom.net/)

Simplified checkout procedure, with order status updates as payments occur
